0:
[core]
cache_dir = /cache
config_dir = /config
data_dir = /app

[logging]
verbosity = 0
format = %(levelname)-8s %(asctime)s [%(process)d:%(threadName)s] %(name)s\n  %(message)s
color = false
config_file =

[audio]
mixer = software
output = audioresample ! audioconvert ! audio/x-raw,rate=48000,channels=2,format=S16LE ! wavenc ! tcpclientsink host=${SVC_SNAPSERVER_ADDR} port=4955
mixer_volume = 45

[mpd]
hostname = 0.0.0.0
zeroconf = radio

[http]
enabled = true
hostname = 0.0.0.0
port = 6680
default_app = iris
zeroconf = radio
csrf_protection = false

[tidal]
enabled = false

[scrobbler]
enabled = false

[youtube]
enabled = false

[tunein]
enabled = false

[jellyfin]
hostname = jellyfin-internal:8096
username = kodi
password = kodi

[spotify]
enabled = false
username = ${SPOTIFY_USERNAME}
password = ${SPOTIFY_PASSWORD}
client_id = ${SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID}
client_secret = ${SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET}

#!/bin/sh

npm install homebridge-myq
npm install homebridge-nest
npm install homebridge-platform-orbit

mkdir -p /data/serverfiles/insurgency/cfg && cp /insserver.cfg /data/serverfiles/insurgency/cfg/insserver.cfg && cp /motd.txt /data/serverfiles/insurgency/motd.txt && chown -R 1000:1000 /data && echo "Setup complete"
